courseDetails.title: Business Process Simplification: Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: Simplify your business processes, making them more effective, efficient and productive in this practically built course.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Effective processes are crucial to the success of any organization. They are vehicles that enable our colleagues to produce our products, services and outputs. They are the lifeblood of any business. However, if those processes are not performing as effectively as they could be, they can be a real hinderance on the successful performance or individuals and the quality of their outputs.

This is where business simplification comes in. Being able to simplify your business processes is a skill highly in demand today. This skill enables you to identify opportunities within a process to reduce waste, time and effort. It is an approach which educates you on the best tools and techniques available to help you solution for problems, issues and defects holding back your processes. Business process simplification is a continual effort, and this never ending approach means it is a highly desirable skill as it will always be required by businesses large and small, in all industries.

In this course we are going to cover off the following:

- What business process simplification is (with examples, the what, why and when etc.)

- How business process simplification can be pursued (the approaches and techniques)

- The various methodologies that can support this approach (Lean, PDCA etc.)

- The 8 stage process to follow when delivering a simplification project (define, map, analyze etc.)

- The key considerations you must think through each time (automation, standardization, the role of teams and data etc.)

This course has been built to finely balance theory and practical - for each relevant section we will explore what it is, detail how to pursue it and give a practical demonstration of how the how can be achieved. The course also has a series of practical exercises and interactive templates included, so you can be as involved or not in this learning experience as you would like - you can tailor the experience to your own learning approach.
targetAudiences: Anyone working for a company who wants to deliver more efficient and effective processes
Anyone who owns a business / manages a department and wants to deliver simpler processes
Anyone who wants to save their organization time and effort
Anyone who wants to leave this course confident in how to drastically improve processes

courseDetails.title: Linux Zero To Hero: 5 Hours Course Best for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Linux in Just 5 Hours!
courseDetails.longDescription:
I am covering following topics in this course. This comprehensive Linux course is designed for both beginners and intermediate users, focusing on essential skills for downloading, installing, and configuring Linux systems.

Module 1 Introduction to Linux to understand what are all use cases of Linux in day to day life.

Module 2 introduces learners to key concepts such as hypervisors, with hands-on experience in downloading and installing Oracle VirtualBox. Participants will explore differences between CentOS and Red Hat, including upstream and downstream distributions, and will create virtual machines. Practical installation sessions cover CentOS Stream 9, RHEL, and Ubuntu, with additional training on using snapshots and deploying Linux on AWS Cloud.

Module 3 delves into accessing Linux systems and understanding the file system. Students will learn crucial commands for accessing Linux machines via SSH and PuTTY, navigate the Linux file structure, and manage files and directories. Topics such as file types, changing passwords, and the distinction between soft and hard links are covered.

Module 4 provides foundational Linux command skills, emphasizing command syntax, file permissions, and ownership. Students will practice using input/output redirection, pipes, and various commands for file manipulation, filtering, and comparison. Additional topics include network commands, system updates, and repository management, equipping learners with the skills needed for efficient Linux system management.

courseDetails.title: Create a 3d War Horn in Maya and Substance Painter
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Art of 3D Modeling and Texturing for Game Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Description:

Unlock the secrets of professional 3D modeling and texturing with our comprehensive course, "Create a 3D War Horn in Maya and Substance Painter." This course is designed for both beginners and intermediate 3D artists who are looking to elevate their skills and create stunning, game-ready assets. Through step-by-step instructions and hands-on projects, you will learn how to model, texture, and optimize a detailed 3D war horn using industry-standard software: Autodesk Maya and Substance Painter.

What You'll Learn:

  • Master 3D Modeling Techniques in Maya: Learn to create a detailed 3D war horn model using various modeling techniques, including polygonal modeling, sculpting, and texturing in Autodesk Maya.

  • Texture and Paint Models in Substance Painter: Discover how to apply realistic textures and materials to your 3D war horn model using Substance Painter, mastering techniques such as baking, painting, and layering textures.

  • Integrate 3D Assets into Game Engines: Export your textured 3D war horn models from Maya and Substance Painter and import them into popular game engines like Unity or Unreal Engine, ready for use in game development projects.

Course Content:

  • Introduction to 3D Modeling in Maya

    • Getting started with Autodesk Maya

    • Creating the base shape of the war horn

  • Advanced Modeling Techniques

    • Adding intricate details and sculpting

    • Refining shapes and edges

    • Preparing the model for texturing

  • Introduction to Substance Painter

    • Setting up your project in Substance Painter

    • Importing the 3D model from Maya

  • Texturing and Painting in Substance Painter

    • Applying base materials and textures

    • Adding details and weathering effects

    • Baking and exporting textures

  • Optimizing and Exporting Models

    • UV mapping and optimization techniques

    • Exporting models for game engines

  • Integrating with Game Engines

    • Importing models into Unreal Engine

    • Final adjustments and troubleshooting

Who This Course is For:

  • Aspiring 3D artists and modelers

  • Game developers looking to create detailed assets

  • Intermediate 3D artists wanting to refine their skills

  • Anyone interested in learning Maya and Substance Painter

Course Requirements:

  • Basic understanding of 3D modeling concepts

  • A computer capable of running Autodesk Maya and Substance Painter

  • Autodesk Maya and Substance Painter software (free trial or licensed versions)

Enroll Now:

Join us in "Create a 3D War Horn in Maya and Substance Painter" and take your 3D modeling skills to the next level. Enroll now and start creating stunning, game-ready assets today!
targetAudiences: Beginner to mid level users, artist who are looking to get into 3d modeling in Maya and Texturing in Substance Painter. Professionals who are looking to integrate Unreal Engine into their workflow.
